metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3550 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Mediawiki v1.40.0 does not validate namespaces used in XML files. Therefore, if the instance administrator allows XML file uploads, a remote attacker with a low-privileged user account can use this exploit to become an administrator by sending a malicious link to the instance administrator.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
